column1: Smoque BBQ////It's always good when you find a place that does such a good job with the brisket that you can eat it without BBQ sauce! The brisket was good but honestly
column2: my favorite thing was the baked beans! Really great Smokey flavor with good size pieces of meat in the beans. I was glad they had an outdoor dining area. It's nice to be able to sit outside
column3: even if it's not really a beautiful area to look at.
